vlive.korean: 아~ 냉동실에 넣었습니다 냉동실 되겠죠? Ah, I put it in the freezer. That's okay, right? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 마음에 탕🍬탕🍬사탕❤
vlive.english: Ah, I put it in the freezer. That's okay, right?

vlive.korean: 이게 냉동실에 넣으면 안 되겠죠? You can't put this in the freezer, right? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 마음에 탕🍬탕🍬사탕❤
vlive.english: You can't put this in the freezer, right?

vlive.korean: [눈을 의심] [냉동 다람쥐] 깜짝 놀랐어! [Can't believe it] What a surprised! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : K팝 걸그룹의 스킨케어 비법 대공개!!┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임 2 - ROCKETPUNCH UNIVERSE] EP5
아~ 이게 냉동실에 넣으면 오히려 안 굳는 건가? Ah, if you put it in the freezer it doesn't harden? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 마음에 탕🍬탕🍬사탕❤
vlive.english: Ah, if you put it in the freezer it doesn't harden?

vlive.korean: 거기다가 냉동 블루베리 넣어 먹으면 얼마나 맛있게요? If I add frozen blueberries to that, do you know how good that is? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 🌜🌛 = 애옹이의 '달달'한 방송(MINHYUN's staring game)
vlive.english: If I add frozen blueberries to that, do you know how good that is?

examples.korean: a lorry load of frozen fish 발음듣기 냉동 생선을 실은 대형 화물차 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a lorry load of frozen fish 발음

examples.korean: Can you freeze this cake? 발음듣기 이 케이크 냉동할 수 있어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you freeze this cake? 발음

examples.korean: Some fruits freeze better than others. 발음듣기 일부 과일은 다른 과일들보다 냉동 보관이 더 잘 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some fruits freeze better than others. 발음

examples.korean: These meals are ideal for home freezing. 발음듣기 이 식사류는 가정에서 냉동 보관하기에 이상적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These meals are ideal for home freezing. 발음

examples.korean: She had her eggs harvested and frozen for her own future use. 발음듣기 그녀는 자신의 난자를 채취하여 나중에 이용하기 위해 냉동시켜 두었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had her eggs harvested and frozen for her own future use. 발음
